Docs.summary: IAppBuilder extension methods for the ErrorPageMiddleware.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Owin.IAppBuilder UseErrorPage (this Owin.IAppBuilder builder);
.method public static hidebysig class Owin.IAppBuilder UseErrorPage(class Owin.IAppBuilder builder) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseErrorPage (builder As IAppBuilder) As IAppBuilder

Docs.summary: Captures synchronous and asynchronous exceptions from the pipeline and generates HTML error responses. Full error details are only displayed by default if 'host.AppMode' is set to 'development' in the IAppBuilder.Properties.

<Extension()> Public Function UseErrorPage (builder As IAppBuilder, options As ErrorPageOptions) As IAppBuilder

Docs.summary: Captures synchronous and asynchronous exceptions from the pipeline and generates HTML error responses. Full error details are only displayed by default if 'host.AppMode' is set to 'development' in the IAppBuilder.Properties.
